LABEL.BECOME_INSTRUCTOR: Become an instructor on Edu Quest
LABEL.BECOME_INSTRUCTOR_SUB: Create online courses, reach over the world and gain wealthy
LABEL.HOME_HERO_SUB_TITLE: Level up your skills with immersive, interactive, and rewarding learning experiences.
LABEL.EARN_EXP_LEVEL_UP_CONTENT: Gain EXP from courses, quizzes, and challenges to unlock new content.
LABEL.COLLECT_GOLD_REWARDS_CONTENT: Earn Gold daily and redeem for exclusive content, avatars, or discounts.
LABEL.CUSTOMIZE_3D_FOX_CONTENT: Customize your personal 3D Fox with outfits, accessories, and expressions.
LABEL.EQUIP_LEARNING_TOOLS_CONTENT: Unlock items like 'Focus Boosters' and 'XP Multipliers' for better study sessions.
LABEL.COMPLETE_CHALLENGES_CONTENT: Complete daily and weekly quests for extra EXP and rare rewards.
LABEL.LEADERBOARD_ACHIEVEMENTS_CONTENT: Compete and earn badges to showcase your skills.
LABEL.STREAK_REWARDS_CONTENT: Keep your streak to earn EXP boosts and Gold multipliers.
LABEL.FEATURES_SUB_TITLE: Edu Quest provides innovative tools and gamification to enhance your learning.
LABEL.TRENDING_COURSES_SUB_TITLE: Explore the latest and most popular courses to stay ahead
LABEL.PERSONALIZED_LEARNING_CONTENT: Unlock a personalized learning experience with paths that evolve to match your unique pace and aspirations.
LABEL.GAMIFIED_MOTIVATION_CONTENT: Engage in a dynamic, game-inspired environment where every achievement and challenge makes learning exciting and rewarding.
LABEL.EXPERTISE_CONTENT: Gain exclusive access to courses led by industry pioneers, offering cutting-edge knowledge and insights.
LABEL.PROGRESS_TRACKING_CONTENT: Track your evolution with real-time, interactive feedback, empowering you to conquer new milestones effortlessly.
LABEL.COMMUNITY_SUPPORT_CONTENT: Connect, collaborate, and thrive with a vibrant network of learners, fostering knowledge exchange and peer-driven growth.
LABEL.WHY_CHOOSE_US_SUB_TITLE: Edu Quest delivers a dynamic and personalized learning experience that keeps you motivated.
LABEL.WEB_STATISTICS_SUB_TITLE: Numbers donâ€™t lie, see how learners worldwide are leveling up, unlocking achievements, and turning knowledge into power!
LABEL.OUR_STORY_CONTENT: Education is the foundation of growth, yet traditional learning methods can often feel repetitive and uninspiring. Edu Quest was born from a vision to change that by transforming learning into an engaging adventure. With the rise of game-based learning and interactive education, we saw an opportunity to create a platform that not only helps students retain knowledge but also keeps them motivated through challenges, rewards, and friendly competition.
LABEL.WHAT_DIFFERENT_CONTENT: At Edu Quest, we believe in learning through experience. Instead of passively absorbing information, learners actively participate in quests, unlock achievements, and track their progress in a dynamic, game-like environment.
LABEL.NO_BORING_SESSION_CONTENT: Every lesson is designed to be interactive and rewarding.
LABEL.NO_ONE_SIZE_FIT_CONTENT: We give students the freedom to customize their learning journey.
LABEL.NO_ISOLATE_LEARNING_CONTENT: Collaboration and community-driven progress are at the heart of our platform.
LABEL.ENAGEMENT_FIRST_CONTENT: Learning should be fun and immersive.
LABEL.GOAL_ORIENTED_CONTENT: Every small achievement leads to bigger milestones
LABEL.COMMUNITY_COLLAB_CONTENT: Education is more impactful when shared
LABEL.CONTINUOUS_INNOVATION_CONTENT: Weâ€™re always improving to make learning better.
LABEL.LOOKING_AHEAD_CONTENT: Edu Quest is more than just a platform; it is a movement toward a smarter, more engaging way of learning. As we grow, we aim to integrate AI-driven recommendations, expand our course offerings, and enhance collaboration features to make education more accessible and exciting. This is just the beginning. Are you ready to embark on your learning journey?
LABEL.TERMS_OF_SERVICE_CONTENT: Welcome to Edu Quest! These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our platform, website, and services ('Services'). By accessing or using Edu Quest, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our Services.
LABEL.USE_OF_PLATFORM_CONTENT: Eligibility: You must be at least 13 years old to use Edu Quest. If you are under 18, you must have parental or guardian consent. | Account Registration: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials and ensuring the accuracy of your provided information. | Acceptable Use: You agree not to misuse the platform, including but not limited to uploading or sharing harmful, offensive, or illegal content, attempting to hack, disrupt, or interfere with the Services, and violating intellectual property rights or using the platform for unauthorized commercial purposes.
LABEL.CONTENT_AND_IP_CONTENT: User-Generated Content: You retain ownership of any content you create or submit, but you grant Edu Quest a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use, modify, display, and distribute your content for platform operations. | Platform Content: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property provided by Edu Quest (logos, text, graphics, software) belong to us or our licensors and may not be copied, modified, or distributed without permission.
LABEL.PAYMENT_AND_SUBSCRIPTIONS_CONTENT: Pricing: Certain features of Edu Quest may require payment. Pricing and billing details will be clearly communicated before purchase. | Refunds: We offer refunds only in accordance with our refund policy. | Subscription Cancellations: You may cancel your subscription anytime, but cancellation may not result in a refund.
LABEL.PRIVACY_AND_DATA_PROTECTION_CONTENT: Your use of the platform is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. By using Edu Quest, you acknowledge that you have read and agreed to our Privacy Policy.
LABEL.DISCLAIMERS_AND_LIABILITY_CONTENT: No Guarantee of Results: Edu Quest is an educational tool, and we do not guarantee any specific learning outcomes. | Service Availability: We strive for uninterrupted service but do not guarantee that the platform will always be available or free from errors. | Limitation of Liability: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Edu Quest is not responsible for any direct, indirect, or incidental damages resulting from your use of the platform.
LABEL.TERMINATION_CONTENT: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to Edu Quest if you violate these Terms or engage in prohibited activities.
LABEL.CHANGES_TO_TERMS_CONTENT: We may update these Terms from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated to users, and continued use of the platform after updates constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
LABEL.GOVERNING_LAW_CONTENT: These Terms are governed by the laws of [Your Country/Region]. Any disputes will be resolved through negotiation or legal means in the appropriate jurisdiction.
LABEL.CONTACT_US_CONTENT: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at eduquestwork@gmail.com.
LABEL.PRIVACY_POLICY_CONTENT: Welcome to Edu Quest. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our platform. By accessing Edu Quest, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.
LABEL.DATA_WE_COLLECT_CONTENT: Personal Information: Name, email address, age, profile information. | Usage Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and platform activity. | Cookies & Tracking Data: We use cookies and tracking technologies to enhance user experience and analytics.
LABEL.HOW_WE_USE_YOUR_DATA_CONTENT: Provide and improve our platform's functionality. | Personalize your learning experience with AI-driven recommendations. | Communicate updates, promotions, or policy changes. | Ensure security, fraud prevention, and compliance with legal obligations.
LABEL.DATA_SHARING_AND_THIRD_PARTY_SERVICES_CO: We do not sell your personal data. | We may share limited data with trusted third-party service providers (e.g., payment processors, analytics tools) to enhance our platform. | If required by law, we may disclose your data to legal authorities.
LABEL.DATA_SECURITY_CONTENT: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
LABEL.YOUR_RIGHTS_AND_CHOICES_CONTENT: You can access, update, or delete your account information at any time. | You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. | You may opt out of marketing emails by following the unsubscribe instructions.
LABEL.RETENTION_OF_DATA_CONTENT: We retain your data as long as necessary to fulfill platform services and legal requirements. If you delete your account, we may retain some data for record-keeping purposes.
LABEL.CHANGES_TO_POLICY_CONTENT: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated via email or platform notifications.
LABEL.CONTACT_US_CONTENT: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at eduquestwork@gmail.com.
LABEL.WHATS_NEW_INSTRUCTOR: Here's what's happening with your courses today.
LABEL.PENDING_BALANCE_DESCRIPTION: Earnings on hold to cover potential refunds
LABEL.AVAILABLE_BALANCE_DESCRIPTION: NET value received from Edu Quest to your stripe account
LABEL.COURSE_REVENUE_SUB: All time revenue from your courses
LABEL.FAST_SUB: These questions will appear randomly in this video
LABEL.ASSIGNMENT_ANSWER_LANGUAGE_SUB: Choose the coding language learner will use to answer
LABEL.ASSIGNMENT_EXPECTED_ANSWER_SUB: The value return when the code compiled (Ex: [1, 2, 3])
LABEL.ASSIGNMENT_INPUT_ARGUMENT_SUB: The arguments that will be passed to the function (Ex: 'Fox', 1)
LABEL.PASS_PERCENTAGES_SUB: The correct percentages that learner need to pass the quiz
LABEL.TIME_LIMIT_SUB: The maximum time learner can spend to answer, 0 for unlimited
LABEL.COURSES_SUB: Categorize courses using tags to make it easier to search
LABEL.NAME: Name
LABEL.SEARCH_USERS: Search users by name (Enter to search)
LABEL.ADD_CODE_INPUT_SUB: By default, code will be generate by the system
LABEL.QUESTION: Question
LABEL.FREE_LEARNER_DESCRIPTION: Find the perfect courses tailored to your interests | Customize your own learning path or follow expert-created ones | Earn EXP, Gold, and level up as you progress | Get free Fox characters and exclusive in-game items | Track your personal learning statistics and progress | Compete with others on the leaderboard and rankings | Complete quests to earn rewards and boost motivation | Unlock achievements and collect special badges
LABEL.FREE_INSTRUCTOR_DESCRIPTION: Create unlimited courses and learning materials | Reuse materials effortlessly across multiple courses | Upload videos, documents, quizzes, and assignments with ease | Get detailed course statistics, including revenue and learner insights | Access comprehensive revenue reports to track earnings | Engage learners with interactive and gamified course elements | Manage and organize courses seamlessly with an intuitive dashboard | Receive feedback and ratings to improve your courses | Connect with a growing community of passionate educators | Earn revenue with just an {{commisionFee}}% commission fee.
LABEL.PREMIUM_INSTRUCTOR_DESCRIPTION: Reduce commission rate to {{CommissionFee}}% | Unlock advanced tools to track learner insights and activities | Create course series with custom pricing | Send marketing emails {{MarketingEmailPerMonth}} times a month
LABEL.PREMIUM_LEARNER_DESCRIPTION: Enjoy {{CouponPerMonth}} exclusive coupons every month with discounts up to {{CouponDiscountUpto}}% | Earn {{ExtraGoldAndExp}}% extra EXP & Gold to boost your learning journey | Try up to {{TrialCoursePercentage}}% of any course for free, limited to {{CourseTrialPerMonth}} courses per month

LABEL.CERTIFICATE_TITLE: This certificate above verifies that {{userName}} has successfully completed the {{courseName}} on {{issuedDate}} on Edu Quest. The certificate indicates the entire course was completed as validated by the student. The course duration represents the total video hours of the course at time of most recent completion.
LABEL.HEADLINE: Headline
LABEL.HEADLINE_SUB: Short sentence describe what you are doing (may be where) (20 - 50 characters)
LABEL.DESCRIPTION_SUB: Describe longer about your self to gather learners' trust (40 - 200 characters)
LABEL.BECOME_INSTRUCTOR_APPROVED: Your instructor application have been approved
LABEL.LEADERBOARD_SUB: Top learners have most learning time this year
LABEL.RESET_SUCCESSFULLY: Password reset successfully, please check your email for new password
LABEL.PATH_EXCEED_DEADLINE: You have exceed the course's deadline of the learning path
LABEL.PATH_EXTEND_DEADLINE: do you want to extend the course's deadline?

LABEL.REWARD_LESSON_PEICES: You have completed a lesson and received

MESSAGE.PLEASE_ADD_LESSON: You need to add at least 1 lesson and 1 material
MESSAGE.COURSE_MISSING_TAG: Course must have category (Subject and Level)
MESSAGE.DO_NOT_HAVE_STRIPE: You do not have any existed payment account, you will be redirect to the config site
MESSAGE.CREATE_ACCOUNT_SUCCESSFULLY: Signup successfully, please signin to continue
MESSAGE.FAILED_TO_MARK: Failed to mark, pleas try again later
MESSAGE.FAILED_TO_REFUND: Failed to refund, please try again later
MESSAGE.CAN_NOT_REFUND: Can not refund course because your progress over 15%
MESSAGE.ERROR_HEADLINE: Headline must be between 20 and 50 characters.
MESSAGE.ERROR_DESCRIPTION: Description must be between 40 and 200 characters.
MESSAGE.ERROR_FILES: At least one certificate file is required.
MESSAGE.FAILED_REWARD_QUEST: Failed to reward quest, please try again later
MESSAGE.COMPLETED_COURSE: Congratulations, you have finished this course and rewarded a certificate
MESSAGE.SENT_APPROVAL_SUCCESSFULLY: Created approval request successfully, waiting for approval...
MESSAGE.COURSE_EXISTED_LEARNINGPATH: This course already existed in this learning path
MESSAGE.DROP_VIDEO: Drop video here or click to upload (Video should be landscape)
MESSAGE.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: 501: Internal server error, Please try again later
MESSAGE.UNAUTHORIZED: 401: Unauthorized, you need to login to do this
MESSAGE.NO_PERMISSION: 403: You don't have permission to do this
MESSAGE.NOT_FOUND: 404: Your performed action have no result, Not Found!
MESSAGE.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Unknown error, Please try again later
MESSAGE.DROP_IMAGE_ADD_THUMBNAIL: Drop image here or click to add thumbnail
MESSAGE.COURSE_NEED_THUMBNAIL: You need to upload a thumbnail
MESSAGE.INVALID_STAGES: Lesson must not have empty name or no material
MESSAGE.INVALID_VIDEO: Please upload a landscape video file
MESSAGE.NEED_TO_UPLOAD_VIDEO: You need to upload a video
MESSAGE.MISSING_QUESTION: There are some questions do not have content
MESSAGE.MISSING_ANSWER: There are some answers do not have content
MESSAGE.MISSING_CORRECT_ANSWER: Each question must have a correct answer
MESSAGE.NO_EXPECTED_ANSWER_OR_ARGUMENTS: You need to provide expected answer and input arguments
MESSAGE.NEED_ALEAST_ANSWERS: Each question must have at least {{value}} answers
MESSAGE.NEED_ALEAST_QUESTIONS: You need to provide at least {{value}} question
MESSAGE.NO_ITEM_TO_ADD: You have to select atleast 1 item to add
MESSAGE.EMPTY_QUESTNAME: Quest Name can not be empty
MESSAGE.NO_REWARD_VALUE: Some reward do not have value
MESSAGE.DUPLICATE_REWARD: Reward type can not be duplicate
MESSAGE.REWARD_ZERO: Reward value must be greater than 0
MESSAGE.FAILED_FEEDBACK: Failed to feedback, please try again later
MESSAGE.REGISTER_PROCESSING: Edu Quest is processing your apllications, please wait a moments...
MESSAGE.FAILED_CANCEL: Failed to cancel, please try again later
MESSAGE.ASSIGNED_FAIL: Failed to assign, please try again later
MESSAGE.UPDATED_FAIL: Failed to update, please try again later
MESSAGE.HAVENT_APPLIED_INSTRUCTOR: Learner status must be 'Pending' to approve or reject to become an instructor
MESSAGE.COURSE_SHOULD_BE_PENDING: Course status must be 'Pending' to approve or reject.
MESSAGE.A_STAFF_HAS_ASSIGN_COURSE_TO_YOU: A staff has assign a course to you
MESSAGE.A_STAFF_HAS_ASSIGN_INSTRUCTOR_TO_YOU: A staff has assign an instructor to you
MESSAGE.YOU ARE NOT OWNER OF THIS MATERIAL: You are not owned this material
MESSAGE.ALREADY_IN_COURSE: You Already enrolled in to this course
MESSAGE.YOUR_MONEY_WAS_TRANSFERED_FROM_THE_PLATF: Transfer money from platform to you
MESSAGE.NEED_TO_COMPLETE_PAYMENT: You need to complete your payment first
MESSAGE.BECOME_INSTRUCTOR_APPROVED: Your request to become an instructor have been accepted
MESSAGE.BECOME_INSTRUCTOR_REJECTED: Your request to become an instructor have been rejected
MESSAGE.START_TIME_PASSED_ERROR: Start time must greater or equals current time
